# LogWidget API

::: email_widget.widgets.log_widget.LogWidget
    options:
        show_root_heading: true
        show_source: false
        heading_level: 3
        filters:
          - "!^_"
          - "!^.*args$"
          - "!^.*kwargs$"

## Log Entry (LogEntry)

::: email_widget.widgets.log_widget.LogEntry
    options:
        show_root_heading: true
        show_source: false
        heading_level: 4
        filters:
          - "!^_"
          - "!^.*args$"
          - "!^.*kwargs$"
